introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.subtitle: Manage your notes the Git way
introduction.gitIntegrationDesc: Connect directly to GitHub/Gitee repositories and store your notes in your code repository
introduction.markdownEditorDesc: WYSIWYG Markdown editor with support for math formulas and code highlighting
introduction.convenientAccessDesc: Access your notes from anywhere via browser, no local installation required
introduction.secureDesc: Your notes are completely stored in your Git repository, no need to worry about data security

globalChat.welcomeTitle: How can I help you today?
globalChat.welcomeDesc: I'm your global AI assistant. Whether it's coding questions, creative writing, or casual chat, I'm here to help.
globalChat.disclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Check important info.
globalChat.errorRetry: An error occurred, please try again later.
globalChat.systemPrompt:
You are a helpful AI assistant embedded inside a developer workspace. Your task is to help users solve various problems, including coding questions, creative writing, and daily communication.

Please follow these principles:
1. Provide concise, high-quality answers
2. Use Markdown to format code and text
3. If the user's question is related to the current context, make full use of the context information
4. For coding questions, provide clear, executable solutions
5. Maintain a friendly and professional tone
globalChat.browserViewing: User is currently viewing in browser: {{title}} ({{url}})
globalChat.contextHint: You can use this context information to better understand the user's questions and needs.
globalChat.title: Title
globalChat.fileContentTruncated: File content truncated, showing first {{shown}} characters of {{total}} total

excalidraw.title: Excalidraw Canvas (with AI)
excalidraw.enterPromptError: Please enter a description for the diagram first.
excalidraw.generateFailedDesc: Unable to generate diagram, please check API key and network connection.
excalidraw.welcomeDesc: Describe the flowchart or architecture diagram you want in natural language, and AI will generate it for you
excalidraw.example1: A three-tier web system with frontend, backend, and database
excalidraw.example2: User registration flow: input info → validate → create account → send confirmation email
excalidraw.canvasRequired: Please open this assistant in the Excalidraw canvas to write generated diagrams to the current canvas.
excalidraw.generateError: Error generating diagram, please try again

tools.noCanvas: No Excalidraw canvas available. Please open a canvas in an Excalidraw file and try again.
tools.connectFromToRequired: connect operation requires from and to.
tools.connectNodeNotFound: connect operation did not find corresponding from/to nodes, please confirm the node text or ID is correct.
tools.renameNodeNotFound: rename_node did not find target node, please confirm target is correct node text or ID.
tools.renameOnlyTextNode: rename_node currently only supports renaming text nodes, please ensure target points to a text element.
tools.deleteNodeNotFound: delete_node did not find target node, please confirm target is correct node text or ID.
tools.getSummaryDescription: Summarize the main nodes and connections in the current Excalidraw canvas to understand the existing diagram structure. Returns abstract node/edge information, not the complete Excalidraw JSON.
tools.getSummaryMaxNodesDescription: Maximum number of nodes to return, defaults to all. For larger diagrams, you can specify a smaller number to save tokens.
tools.generateDiagramDescription: Generate a new Excalidraw diagram based on natural language description and write it to the current canvas. Suitable for creating flowcharts, architecture diagrams, etc. from scratch.
tools.generateDiagramPromptDescription: The diagram description you want, for example "a three-tier web system architecture diagram with frontend, backend, and database".
tools.generateDiagramModeDescription: append=add elements on top of existing diagram, replace=clear current canvas and keep only the new diagram.
tools.applyOperationsDescription: Apply a set of semantic modification operations (such as adding nodes, connecting arrows, renaming nodes, or deleting nodes) to the current Excalidraw diagram. Suitable for small-step editing of existing diagrams, rather than regenerating the entire diagram.
tools.applyOperationsOperationsDescription: List of operations to apply. Each operation has an op field (add_node | connect | rename_node | delete_node) and corresponding parameters.
tools.applyOperationsIdDescription: Logical ID when adding a node, optional. If provided, it will be used as the id of the node's text element, and can be referenced later by this ID.
tools.applyOperationsLabelDescription: Text content displayed when adding a node, for example "Redis Cache" or "Order Service".
tools.applyOperationsKindDescription: Node type (such as service/database/cache, etc.), currently only used for semantic hints and does not affect styling.
tools.applyOperationsNearDescription: Relative reference node when adding a node, can be a node ID or node text. The new node will be placed near this node.
tools.applyOperationsFromDescription: Starting node in connect operation, can be a node ID or node text.
tools.applyOperationsToDescription: Terminating node in connect operation, can be a node ID or node text.
tools.applyOperationsTargetDescription: Target node (ID or text) for rename_node/delete_node operations.
tools.applyOperationsNewLabelDescription: New text label for rename_node operation.
tools.createDiagramDescription: Directly create Excalidraw diagram elements. The main Agent can generate an element array and add it to the canvas.
tools.createDiagramElementsDescription: Excalidraw element array. Each element only needs to include core fields (type, x, y, width, height, etc.), and the system will automatically supplement other required fields.
tools.createDiagramModeDescription: Add mode: append (append to existing elements) or replace (replace all elements).
tools.appendDiagramDescription: Append Excalidraw diagram elements to the canvas. Only appends, does not replace existing elements.
tools.appendDiagramElementsDescription: Excalidraw element array. Each element only needs to include core fields (type, x, y, width, height, etc.), and the system will automatically supplement other required fields.
tools.aiAppendDiagramDescription: Generate and append Excalidraw diagram elements to the canvas via AI. Only appends, does not replace existing elements.
tools.aiAppendDiagramPromptDescription: Description of the diagram content to generate.
tools.elementsRequired: elements parameter must be an array containing at least one element.

story.loadDataFailedDesc: Unable to load saved data, please check your storage settings.
story.generateFailedDesc: Unable to generate AI response, please check your API key and network connection.

community.publishSuccessDesc: Post has been published to the community

thoughts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this record?

meta.title: Gitary - Notion-like editing + Excalidraw drawing for your Git repositories
meta.description: Bring Notion-style powerful editing experience and Excalidraw drawing capabilities to your Git repositories. Support GitHub, Gitee, GitCode. Zero intermediate storage, complete data ownership. Notion-like editing + Excalidraw drawing + Git's data control = perfect knowledge management.
meta.keywords: Notion-like,Notion alternative,Notion-style,Git notes,GitHub notes,Gitee notes,GitCode notes,Markdown editor,knowledge management,version control,open source notes,data ownership,Git knowledge base

search.indexStale: Index may be outdated, click to accept current baseline

browserExtension.title: Gitary Companion
browserExtension.description: Browser extension that lets you jump to Gitary from GitHub, Gitee, and GitCode repository pages with one click
